sn16.6:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam mahakassapam bhagava etadavoca:
sn16.6:1.5: Aham va, kassapa, bhikkhu ovadeyyam tvam va;
sn16.6:1.6: aham va bhikkhunam dhammim katham kareyyam tvam va”ti.
sn16.6:2.1: “Dubbaca kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhu, dovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagata, akkhama, appadakkhinaggahino anusasanim.
sn16.6:2.2: Idhaham, bhante, addasam bhandanca nama bhikkhum anandassa saddhiviharim abhijikanca nama bhikkhum anuruddhassa saddhiviharim annamannam sutena accavadante:
sn16.6:2.3: ‘ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’”ti.
sn16.6:3.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
sn16.6:3.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhandanca bhikkhum anandassa saddhiviharim abhijikanca bhikkhum anuruddhassa saddhiviharim amantehi:
sn16.6:3.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn16.6:4.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhu bhagava etadavoca:
sn16.6:4.2: “saccam kira tumhe, bhikkhave, annamannam sutena accavadatha:
sn16.6:4.3: ‘ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’”ti?
sn16.6:4.5: “Kim nu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha:
sn16.6:4.7: ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’”ti?
sn16.6:4.9: “No ce kira me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha, atha kincarahi tumhe, moghapurisa, kim jananta kim passanta evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana annamannam sutena accavadatha:
sn16.6:4.10: ‘ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’”ti.
sn16.6:5.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn16.6:5.2: “accayo no, bhante, accagama, yathabale yathamulhe yathaakusale, ye mayam evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana annamannam sutena accavadimha:
sn16.6:5.3: ‘ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’ti.
sn16.6:5.4: Tesam no, bhante, bhagava accayam accayato patigganhatu ayatim samvaraya”ti.
sn16.6:6.1: “Taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, accayo accagama yathabale yathamulhe yathaakusale, ye tumhe evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana annamannam sutena accavadittha:
sn16.6:6.2: ‘ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutaram bhasissati, ko sundarataram bhasissati, ko cirataram bhasissati’ti.
sn16.6:6.3: Yato ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikarotha, tam vo mayam patigganhama.
sn16.6:6.4: Vuddhi hesa, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikaroti ayatinca samvaram apajjati”ti.
